chapter.title: Upgrades
chapter.para: The Upgrade Manager controls software updates and new features for your ⪚. The Upgrade Manager is launched from the main Administrative Interface by pushing the Upgrade button as seen in .
Please visit or more details on manually upgrading your ⪚. To configure your ⪚ for automatic upgrades, please refer to .

sect1.title: Administrative Interface
sect1.para: The Administrative Interface is divided into two sections. The first section, covered in , discusses how to manually upgrade your ⪚. discusses how to automatically schedule upgrades as they are made available.

sect2.title: Manual Upgrade
sect2.para: If the ⪚ is not configured to receive and install updates automatically (see ), this tab displays available upgrades. The Manual Upgrade tab is seen in .
When available, upgrades are displayed and may be selected for installation.

sect2.title: Schedule Automatic Upgrade
sect2.para: The Schedule Automatic Upgrade tab, as shown in , is used to configure the ⪚ to contact Metavize periodically to check for upgrades. It can optionaly be configured to install upgrades without Administrative intervention.

The Schedule Automatic Upgrade tab is divided into two sections. The left section is used to confiure the times when ⪚ checks for updates. In the right panel, Administrators can configure the behavior once ⪚ discovers updates. If Do not automatically install new upgrades is selected then ⪚ will only register that updates are available, ane make then visible on the Manual Upgrade Tab. Installation must be done manually (see .
If Automatically install new upgrades is selected, then ⪚ will install upgrades as they are released/made available from Metavize.

question.para: Which should I use - manual or automatic upgrades?

answer.para: It all depends on your preference. For example, some organizations configure desktop Virus Scanning software to automatically update, while others prefer to perform this manually.
